actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Federal Transit Act to increase for 2 fiscal years the Federal share of the costs of establishing and operating a university transportation center.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Transit Act to increase from 50 percent to 100 percent for FY 1993 and 1994 the Federal share of the costs of establishing and operating a university transportation center.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Transit Act to increase for 2 fiscal years the Federal share of the costs of establishing and operating a university transportation center.
